pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====Hydra=====Hydra is a Django app to build templates easily, and generate site page like django admin.Detailed documentation is in the "docs" directory.Quick start-----------1. Add "hydra" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this:: INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'hydra', ]2. Include the polls URLconf in your project urls.py like this:: path('polls/', include('polls.urls')),3. Run ``python manage.py migrate`` to create the polls migrations.4. Continue
